body.p: The release engineering team utilizes a code freeze to maintain stability in the period immediately preceding a release. The developers below have been given explicit approval by re@ to continue conservative work in a narrowly defined area until the expiration dates below. All other developers are required to get approval for each individual change from re@ before committing to the release branch.
General discussions about the release engineering process or quality assurance issues should be sent to the public freebsd-qa mailing list. MFC requests should be sent to re@FreeBSD.org.
